products.name: Premium Carbon Filter
products.description: Advanced filtration for purest water quality
products.detailedDescription: Our premium carbon filter uses activated coconut shell carbon for superior chlorine and organic compound removal. Ideal for both residential and light commercial applications.

products.name: Ceramic Filter Candle
products.detailedDescription: High-purity ceramic filter candles with silver impregnation for bacterial protection. Effective down to 0.2 micron filtration.

products.name: Industrial Filter Media
products.detailedDescription: Designed for industrial water treatment plants, this stainless steel filter media provides superior filtration for large-scale operations. Withstands high pressure and corrosive environments.

products.name: Silica Sand Grade A
products.detailedDescription: Premium grade silica sand with uniform particle size distribution for optimal filtration performance in water treatment systems. Washed and graded to industry standards.

products.name: Multi-Stage Filter System
products.detailedDescription: Comprehensive 5-stage filtration system that removes sediments, chlorine, heavy metals, and organic contaminants. Ideal for whole-house water purification.

products.name: Laboratory Grade Filter
products.detailedDescription: High-purity glass filters designed for laboratory use, providing consistent particle retention and chemical resistance. Suitable for analytical and research applications.

products.name: Activated Carbon Filter
products.detailedDescription: Activated carbon filter with coconut shell media for superior removal of chlorine, VOCs, and organic compounds. Extends the life of RO membranes.

products.name: Sediment Filter
products.description: Removes dirt, rust and other particles
products.detailedDescription: High-capacity polypropylene sediment filter captures sand, silt, rust and other particulate matter. Protects downstream equipment from damage.

products.name: UV Water Purifier
products.description: Kills bacteria and viruses with UV light
products.detailedDescription: Ultraviolet sterilization system that eliminates 99.99% of harmful microorganisms without chemicals. Stainless steel construction with automatic shut-off.

products.name: Reverse Osmosis System
products.detailedDescription: Professional-grade reverse osmosis system with 6-stage filtration process for pure drinking water. Features automatic flushing and tankless design.

products.name: Water Softener Salt
products.description: High purity salt for water softeners
products.detailedDescription: Solar-evaporated salt pellets with 99.8% purity for water softening systems. Minimizes bridging and maintains optimal system performance.

products.name: Filter Housing
products.detailedDescription: Heavy-duty filter housing made from industrial-grade plastic with pressure gauge port. Compatible with standard 10-inch filter cartridges.

products.name: Carbon Block Filter
products.description: Solid carbon block for superior filtration
products.detailedDescription: Compressed carbon block filter with high-density matrix for maximum contaminant removal. Reduces chlorine, pesticides, and heavy metals.

products.name: Sand Filter Media
products.detailedDescription: Specially graded silica sand for pool and water treatment filters. Washed, dried and screened to ensure consistent particle size distribution.

products.name: Water Test Kit
products.detailedDescription: Professional water testing kit with 7 parameters: pH, hardness, chlorine, nitrates, nitrites, iron, and copper. Includes detailed instructions.

products.name: Filter Wrench
products.detailedDescription: Heavy-duty steel wrench designed for easy removal of filter housings. Non-slip grip and adjustable design fits most standard filter sizes.

products.name: Faucet Adapter
products.detailedDescription: Universal faucet adapter with quick-connect fittings compatible with most water filtration systems. Includes multiple thread adapters.

products.name: Sediment Pre-Filter
products.detailedDescription: 5-micron spun polypropylene pre-filter that traps sediments before they reach main filters. Extends the life of downstream filtration elements.

products.name: Alkaline Filter
products.detailedDescription: Ceramic alkaline filter that adds essential minerals like calcium, magnesium and potassium while balancing pH levels for healthier drinking water.

products.name: Iron Removal Filter
products.detailedDescription: Manganese dioxide-based filter media specifically designed for removing iron, manganese and hydrogen sulfide from well water. Regenerates automatically.

products.name: Water Pressure Gauge
products.detailedDescription: Stainless steel pressure gauge with 0-100 PSI range for monitoring water filtration system pressure. Easy-to-read dial with brass fittings.

products.name: Filter O-Rings Set
products.detailedDescription: Complete set of food-grade rubber O-rings for common filter housings. Prevents leaks and maintains system integrity. Compatible with most brands.
